headline: Where in the World Has Dr. Anthony Fauci Gone?
author: Leslie Eastman
sentences:
…”The rapid fading of the COVID apparatus and the withdrawal from the constant appearances in the news cycle by the labcoat tyrant Fauci is a direct function of politics,” said Sexton, explaining that NIAID Director Dr. Anthony Fauci was used as a “weapon’ within the federal bureaucracy--first against President Trump and later against any civilian dissidents of the Biden administration and its policies on that front.”
The video of the pre-schooler being shooed away from the Pooh Bear character at DisneyLand/World shows the child abuse that has become the norm in our society.

"In his speech to the 2022 CPAC in Orange County, Fla., over the weekend, former CIA analyst and radio host Buck Sexton called for a “housecleaning of the bureaucracy” within the federal government, including health care establishment that imposed Draconian rules and restrictions on Americans during the coronavirus pandemic.

The first investigation suggested by Jordan, the top Republican on the House Judiciary Committee, was into “all the lies [and] the misinformation, the disinformation” from Dr. Anthony Fauci and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention with regards to the COVID-19 pandemic.

Fauci has fallen from daily cable appearances to periodic black-guy podcasts on which the hosts think they're cool and funny, while trying to seriously answer stupid-jive questions like, "Why don't we vaccinate the bats instead?"
Within a few years we'll be bombarded with Morgan & Morgan (among others) ads announcing Class action lawsuits on behalf of everyone who was harmed or have family members harmed from the vax.
For nearly two years, the White House coronavirus advisor Dr. Anthony Fauci has appeared at least weekly, if not daily, on news and opinions shows touting the latest Science related to covid.
Then think of the new non stp tours of the media, perhaps holding whatever trophy that is part of the prize, just as Tyrus of the Gutfeld show wears his Wrestling belt over his shoulder.
Do the investigation into Dr. Fraud and his wife (after taking both houses November) and among other things have he and his wife pay restitution with their pensions and their new worth.

The Dems see from their polls that they are going to be creamed in the midterms so its time tor a new boggeyman to be brought to bear on the american people.
I'm banking on Christ's promise that for those who harm children, it will be better for a millstone to be tied to their necks and thrown into the sea.
In my ideal world Tony would have to pony up some of his ill-gotten gains to cover at least some of the money that would be paid out to plaintiffs.
(Snip) Ohio congressman Jim Jordan (R) indicates an investigation into Fauci is a priority if they regain a majority in November’s midterms.
Little Andrew Cuomo alsocould be part of the tour, holding his Emmy, awarded for killing old people with Kung Flu, but being nice about it.

Little Anthony better have jam in his pockets because he's going to be toast - in this world and the next.
Evil was on display in that interaction; evil Disney worker and a sheep* parent (*possibly evil).
America is wising up, although Wuhan served its purpose as a political weapon.
FTA: “...However, in the wake of the abysmal polling, Fauci has disappeared.
Wouldn't it be something if Dr. Fauci receives the Nobel Prize in Medicine?
Time for the administration to move on to a new charade (Russia/Ukraine?)
All the masking/vaccinations did NOTHING to stop or even slow the virus.
My personal opinion is that he is an evil person with no compassion.
Your donation helps keep our discussions going and our voices heard.
It was NEVER about keeping us safe, it was about keeping us scared.
Make sure to go after the money they have received from big pharma.
However, a good dose of earthly justice would suit me just fine.
Fauci was told by his handlers that his usefulness has ended.
I suspect that it is more likely than not that Fauci wins it!
They made YOU bend to their will for their purposes.
Great piece about this on Tucker last night.
I weep for these innocent little ones.
“Many of us have noticed.
See what they did there?
Let them be very scared.
Cloth and N95 masks?
with new "experts."
Symbols of FEAR.
And compliant.
